edu.cmu.cs.ark.sage.effects.EffectSet

    Package Description
    edu.cmu.cs.ark.sage
    Main class for implementation of SAGE.
    edu.cmu.cs.ark.sage.apps
    A collection of easy to use tools for common uses of SAGE.
